      • subFlowMapping

        public RouterSpec<K,R> subFlowMapping(K key,
                                      IntegrationFlow subFlow)
        Add a subflow as an alternative to a channelMapping(Object, String). prefix(String) and suffix(String) cannot be used when subflow mappings are used.
        Parameters:
